964340.name: Fant Kids 3D Matching Game
964340.description:
Fant Kids 3D Matching Game – A Colorful 3D Matching Adventure for All Ages

UPDATE 12/2025 - PC, Mac, and Steam Deck support, GamePad controls

Fant Kids Matching Game is a cheerful and relaxing 3D memory puzzle for children, families, and anyone who enjoys simple, positive gameplay. Explore bright scenes with Fant characters Eddie and Ellie, discover playful objects, and strengthen memory and recognition skills in a friendly learning environment.

Features

11 Themed Matching Scenes

Enjoy a variety of colorful locations designed to support early learning and visual memory:

  • Alphabet letters (language-adaptive)

  • Numbers 0–9

  • Shapes: Cube

  • Shapes: Triangle

  • Shapes: Round

  • Beach

  • Toys

  • Space items

  • Christmas snow scene

  • Wooden vehicles

  • Food items

Each scene uses approachable 3D models, gentle animations, and positive audio feedback.

Language-Adaptive Alphabet Support

The letter-matching scene changes automatically based on your selected language:

  • English: A–Z

  • Finnish: Å, Ä, Ö included

  • Swedish: Å, Ä, Ö included

  • Norwegian: Å, Æ, Ø included

  • Danish: Å, Æ, Ø included

Play Your Way

  • Playable with mouse or trackpad

  • Controller support for TV play or Steam Deck

  • Optimized for Steam Deck, including clear UI and smooth performance

  • Works on PC and Mac

Designed for Families

Fant Kids Matching Game is gentle, colorful, and easy to understand — perfect for young learners, family play sessions, or anyone looking for a relaxing memory challenge.
